introduction: an Austrian based food enthusiast 🍲 and fullstack developer 👨‍💻 working with Typescript, React, GoLang and Python.
aboutMeHeader: As a software developer hailing from Austria, I am skilled in using a variety of technologies to bring cutting-edge projects to life!
aboutMeWeb: Proficient in Typescript, React, Next, TailwindCSS, and Svelte for front end development
aboutMeServer: Experienced in GoLang, Python, and NodeJS for backend development
aboutMeDatabase: Skilled in using SQL and NoSQL databases such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, and MongoDB
aboutMePersonalHeader: When I'm not busy coding, you can find me indulging in a few of my favorite hobbies and pastimes, including:
aboutMePersonal1: Cooking up delicious meals and trying out new recipes in the kitchen
aboutMePersonal2: Exploring the great outdoors and cities
aboutMePersonal3: Playing video games and watching movies with friends and family
